argument.name: prop
argument.description: The pointer variable to populate with the data from the JSON text.

page.description: The property_from_json() requires proper JSON, but is 2 to 5 times faster than json_parse()
page.example:
dim ptr as p property_from_json(ptr,"{ foo : 1}") Error parsing json: Name of an object member must be a string
property_from_json(ptr,"{ \"foo\" : 1}") ? ptr.foo = 1
